data.text: @JessicaPage7 @7NewsPerth Had the border reopened last month, hospital and ICU numbers would be much higher, and people would be dying. The extra 4 weeks bought everyone the time they needed to get boosted. #covid19

@JessicaPage7 @7NewsPerth For all us curious people…could there be a page with covid positive cases- giving a daily update of symptoms, age, vaxxed, etc. so we can understand this whole situation a bit better?…
@JessicaPage7 @7NewsPerth I don’t think anyone cares what the premier thinks anymore. Most can hardly bare the sight of him now
